EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Improves Workload Performance by 20% at Node4
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/safely-increase-infrastructure-utilization/node4-success-story]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Using Turbonomic, Node4 was able to improve performance for over 5,000 virtual workloads by more than 20% and sustainably scale company growth of 60-70%.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/safely-increase-infrastructure-utilization/node4-success-story]]>
"We used to just throw money at hardware to fix our issues. With Turbonomic, we saw that we were not saturated and could in fact consolidate our workloads dramatically - freeing us 17blades." - Gregg Mearing, Head of Managed Services, Node4
More than 1,900 organizations leverage Turbonomic to optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time. See who’s on board by industry <[[https://turbonomic.com/customers/customers-by-industry/]]>.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
